sentences.sentence: They added that the canids were "larger, more slender and sometimes with a more whitish colouration".
sentences.translation: 他们还说这种犬科动物较一般金豺“更大，更苗条，有时毛色也更淡”。

sentences.sentence: Our work suggests that the carotenoid colouration of human skin may represent a similar advertisement of health and fertility.
sentences.translation: 这些鸟类嘴巴和羽毛的颜色也是受类胡萝卜素这种抗氧化剂影响的，就像它影响人的肤色一样。
